value:
Flayn...? Where is Flayn? I cannot
calm down until I know where Flayn
is. I must find her immediately!

As assistant to the Archbishop, I was
swamped with tasks day in, day out.
It seems here, I may relax...

The Order of Heroes faces many
challenges. If there is anything I
can do to help, simply ask it of me.

Is there anywhere to fish around
here? I don't mind if I don't catch
anything. I simply enjoy it.

I wrote a children's fable. Will you
read it and share your thoughts? I'd
like to know if the moral is clear.

So you're $Nu.
I come bearing the
greetings of $Nf.

Things are going quite well, it seems.
Surely this is the goddess's blessing.

Not bad at all. It seems all my
hard work is paying off.

What is this? Have my struggles
been in vain?

I feel a new power... I owe you
my thanks.

I am the one called Seteth. Now
explain yourself—why was I called
to this world?

Were I to return to Garreg Mach, I
can only imagine the pile of tasks
awaiting me...$k$pIn comparison to that, the days I
spend here are like a vacation.$k$pPerhaps it is a bit irresponsible of me
to say so... Rest assured I will execute
your orders faithfully and fully.$k$pYou know, you show quite a lot of
promise. You're talented, responsible,
and brimming with charisma.$k$pI feel as though coming to this world
has meaning, simply because we
could meet. You inspire me.$k$pI am not sure how long I can stay,
but I will do what I can to be of help.
May the goddess protect you.
せいっ！
はあっ！
うぐっ！
馬鹿な……！
Judgment is passed.
You shall not survive.
Just a hindrance.
Do not try to resist.
*pained noise* Even I have fallen...
Haha
I see you are hard at work. I am happy to witness such diligence.
Hm? Were you attempting to surprise me? I shall try to oblige next time.
Curious about my age, are you? Let us leave it at this... I am a fair bit older than you.
The Church of Seiros does not inherently view followers of other religions as our enemies.
Keep this to yourself, but I care more about my sister Flayn's well being than all else...including the church.
Time may pass and the world may change, but people will never stop fighting each other.
You look tired... Please, do not overexert yourself.
Ah.
Is it time?
Let us begin.
